name: Sync Your Household
overview:
SYNC: Home Automation - Interconnecting your Life & Home - Digital Household Management

SYNC: Each household is provided with a custom URL (& hosting) dashboard interface that allows you to monitor, manage, and view any technology capable of WiFi, GPS, IR signals and more. This provides streamlined access to all the digital platforms within a household. Our user interface is HTML5 web-based and can be accessed from virtually any computer. Our dashboard interface will also integrate with current online services and products further putting all your information into one seamless location.

SYNC: Your Home. For the households looking to keep their homes at top notch with digital home automation. Monitor all the homes vital signs, energy consumption, and appliances. When needed, make immediate decisions. SYNC: Your Family. Monitor cars, phones, and tablets through their GPS signals. Each family members is provided with levels of access. See your family calendar, VoIP inbox, Email, Grocery List, and more. SYNC: Your Computers. Remote Desktop access to any computer you own through our secure HTML5 web application and hardware device. SYNC: Your Assets. Have access to your security systems, home entry, and home security cameras.

Through our easy to use dashboard, after setting up the hardware at your house (connected via ethernet and to a monitor/TV), walk through our step-by-step process to set up your household dashboard. Connect as many or as few devices you choose.
